title: Understanding India’s Ascent | BoF VOICES
itunes:title: Understanding India’s Ascent | BoF VOICES
itunes:subtitle: India’s young population, thriving tech sector and spiritual roots add up to a promising future, said the Sun Group vice chairman Shiv Khemka, speaking at BoF’s VOICES.To watch Shiv's talk at VOICES 2018 click here. Sign up for BoF’s Daily Digest
description:
India’s young population, thriving tech sector and spiritual roots add up to a promising future, said the Sun Group vice chairman Shiv Khemka, speaking at BoF’s VOICES.

To watch Shiv's talk at VOICES 2018 click here. 

Sign up for BoF’s Daily Digest newsletter here: http://bit.ly/BoFnews.
